overview:
Carl has over 10 years of entrepreneurial telco & software leadership experience. He launched cloud services for the Nordic Next Gen telco, IP-Only.se. As a senior consultant at Ascade.com, he spent a couple of months at each of the telco Giants as Swisscom, Belgacom, Telenor, Allstream, One, Telecom New Zealand.

Carl holds a MSc from the Institute of Technology in LinkÃ¶ping and Institute Polytechnique de Grenoble. He is also the proud father of three beautiful daughters.
